newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: TENNIS-HINGIS TO OPEN FED CUP FOR SWITZERLAND.
newsitem.headline: TENNIS-HINGIS TO OPEN FED CUP FOR SWITZERLAND.

text.p: Australian Open champion Martina Hingis will open Switzerland's Fed Cup world-group, first-round tie against her native Slovakia on Saturday, playing Katarina Studenikova.
The second singles will be between the Slovak number one Karina Habsudova and Patty Schnyder.
In Sunday's doubles, Habsudova will team up with the Slovak captain Radka Zrubakova against Hingis and Schnyder.
Hingis, the world number two, was born in Kosice in former Czechoslovakia but moved to Switzerland with her mother at the age of seven.
Saturday's matches begin at 1430 GMT, Sunday's at 1300 GMT.
